QuestData.Title: Run Out the Guns
QuestData.Description: We've got the hardware but not the manpower, $n. Man one of the carronades on the shore here and take out those incoming boats!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use a Northwatch Shore Battery to destroy 10 Rageroar Rowboats.
QuestData.RewardText: Ho ho! The beach is ours!$B$BWe just might keep a foothold on this miserable dustball of a continent after all.
